governor().details: Governor is defined in VUSD token contract only

params._token: Token to redeem, it should be 1 of the supported tokens from treasury.
Token to redeem, it should be 1 of the supported tokens from treasury.
params._vusdAmount: VUSD amount to burn. VUSD will be burnt from caller

redeemable(address).details: Current redeemable amount for given token

treasury().details: Treasury is defined in VUSD token contract only

devdoc.title: VUSD Redeemer, User can redeem their VUSD with any supported tokens

redeem(address,uint256).notice: Redeem token and burn VUSD amount less redeem fee, if any.

redeem(address,uint256,address).notice: Redeem token and burn VUSD amount less redeem fee, if any.

redeemable(address,uint256).notice: Current redeemable amount for given token and vusdAmount. If token is not supported by treasury it will return 0. If vusdAmount is higher than current total redeemable of token it will return 0.
